TopicTitle: KSP Updating And Your Saves, a Public Service Announcement.

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Any time KSP is updated there is a chance that savegames are lost or corrupted, so this is a reminder to everyone to back up your saves.

Just copy the saves folder in the Kerbal Space Program directory to a safe place.

Steam users can right click KSP in the Steam client, click "properties", "local files" tab, then the "browse local files" button to find their saves.

Some Windows users may need to look in their "C:/User/yourusername/application data" folder, which may be hidden.

Thank you.
